message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $150. I think it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $120 for the product.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $135. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I still believe I can find the product at a lower price. I am willing to pay $120 for the product.
